Headline: #106 East 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 106 East 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 107th, Cottage Grove, 111th, Doty & 103rd, due to street blockage near 103rd/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#106 East 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 107th, Cottage Grove, 111th, Doty and 103rd, due to street blockage near 103rd/Cottage Grove.

Allow extra travel time.
